title: Expander
desc: Allow the user to toggle display a section of content which can optimize the use of vertical space.
basic_desc: Expander usually have a title and arrow in it. Click the arrow whole row to expand/collapse.
about_desc: Underneath the azure sky, a tranquil river meanders through lush green meadows. A symphony of nature unfolds, with vibrant flowers dancing in the gentle breeze, creating a picturesque scene of serenity and beauty.
expand_desc: Expander usually have a title, arrow and other configurable settings in it. Click the arrow to expand/collapse.
